Content: Met Department says aÂ fair weather condition will prevail over most provinces of the island. It added that showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Uva and Southern provinces after 2 pm. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces during the morning. There may be temporary localized strong winds during thundershowers. The Met Department also urged the general public to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by lightning activity.
